DOC.detailed_description: A non-randomized , prospective study recruit subject diabetes . Subjects include type I type II diabetes various duration naive self-testing blood glucose . Subjects use provide instructions-for-use undergo self-training use device self-test blood glucose level . Results compare obtained lab glucose analyzer .
